name: Lemming Donut
description:
Lemming Donut is a simple but (somewhat) difficult rage platformer where you play as a donut.

Keep out of reach of the lemmings as they stack up and jump in order to successfully deliver you donut to the box at the end. Be careful as it is easy to quickly lose progress and have to redo some levels many times.

---
Art and music by CreepyGunner01 and DelayedJupiter (respectively)

This game was made for the PB Game Jam 5 (Themes "out of reach" and "redo")
